Description: Welcome to this beautifully designed 2bed + 2 full bathroom in the heart of Eagle Hill! Ample closet space + off street parking for an additional $175 make this home unique. Conveniently located close to the highway and Airport T stop yet tucked away into Eagle Hill away from the hustle and bustle of the main streets. Fully renovated building means lower utilities, custom tile and lighting and a well designed layout which amplifies the natural light! Welcome home.
